00016 OaxExport::OaxExport(AssemblyData* data, wxOutputStream* outStream)
00017 {
00018         // data from ObjOaxConv -> export to library
00019         m_saveToFileSystem = false;
00020 
00021         // asign data
00022         m_assemblyData = data;
00023 
00024         // asign out stream
00025         m_outStream = outStream;
00026 
00027         // create oax output stream and store in internal pointer
00028         createOaxStream();

00036 void OaxExport::createXmlEntry()
00037 {
00038         // temporary string for converting
00039         wxString conv;
00040 
00041         // create new empty xml document
00042         wxXmlDocument xml;
00043 
00044         // set xml version
00045         xml.SetVersion(wxT("1.0"));
00046 
00047         // set file encoding
00048         xml.SetFileEncoding(wxT("utf-8"));
00049 
00050         // create root, future root
00051         wxXmlNode* root = new wxXmlNode(wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("oaxml"));
00052 
00053         // add property "standard="oaxml.hs-ulm.de""
00054         root->AddProperty(wxT("standard"), wxT("oaxml.hs-ulm.de"));
00055 
00056         // add property "version="0.1.0""
00057         root->AddProperty(wxT("version"), wxT("0.1.0"));
00058 
00059         // set actual as root
00060         m_actual = root;
00061 
00062         // create data
00063         m_node = new wxXmlNode(m_actual, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("data"));
00064 
00065         // set m_actual to data
00066         m_actual = m_actual->GetChildren();
00067 
00068         // create obj
00069         m_node = new wxXmlNode(m_actual, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("obj"));
00070 
00071         // add scale attribute
00072         conv << (float)m_assemblyData->m_scaleWidth;
00073         conv += wxT(" ");
00074         conv << (float)m_assemblyData->m_scaleHeight;
00075         conv += wxT(" ");
00076         conv << (float)m_assemblyData->m_scaleDepth;
00077         m_node->AddProperty(wxT("scale"), conv);
00078 
00079         // emtpy conv
00080         conv.Empty();
00081 
00082         // add locationOffset
00083         conv << (float)m_assemblyData->m_offsetX;
00084         conv += wxT(" ");
00085         conv << (float)m_assemblyData->m_offsetY;
00086         conv += wxT(" ");
00087         conv << (float)m_assemblyData->m_offsetZ;
00088         m_node->AddProperty(wxT("locationOffset"), conv);
00089 
00090         // add orientationOffset
00091         m_node->AddProperty(wxT("orientationOffset"), wxT("0 0 0"));
00092 
00093         // iterator to walk through m_frameData->m_listFiles and m_frameData->m_tags
00094         std::list<wxString>::iterator it;
00095 
00096         // set it to first entry
00097         it = m_assemblyData->m_listFiles.begin();
00098 
00099         // add ref
00100         m_node->AddProperty(wxT("ref"), (*it).AfterLast('\\'));
00101 
00102         // set m_actual to oaxml
00103         m_actual = m_actual->GetParent();
00104 
00105         // create assemblyInformation
00106         m_node = new wxXmlNode(m_actual, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("assemblyInformation"));
00107 
00108         // set m_actual to assemblyInformation
00109         m_actual = m_actual->GetChildren();
00110 
00111         // create tags
00112         m_node = new wxXmlNode(m_actual, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("tags"));
00113 
00114         // set m_actual to tags
00115         m_actual = m_actual->GetChildren();
00116 
00117         // create tags
00118         for (it = m_assemblyData->m_tags.begin(); it != m_assemblyData->m_tags.end(); it++)
00119         {
00120                 // create tag
00121                 m_node = new wxXmlNode(m_actual, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("tag"));
00122 
00123                 // set tag content
00124                 m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_TEXT_NODE, wxT("tag"), (*it)));
00125         }
00126 
00127         // set m_actual to assemblyInformation
00128         m_actual = m_actual->GetParent();
00129 
00130         // create author
00131         m_node = new wxXmlNode(m_actual, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("author"));
00132 
00133         // create author content
00134         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_TEXT_NODE, wxT("author"), wxT("")));
00135 
00136         // create name
00137         m_node = new wxXmlNode(m_actual, wxXML_ELEMENT_NODE, wxT("name"));
00138 
00139         // set m_actual to name
00140         m_node->AddChild(new wxXmlNode(wxXML_TEXT_NODE, wxT("name"), m_assemblyData->m_name));
00141 
00142         // set root
00143         xml.SetRoot(root);
00144 
00145         // create new entry
00146         m_outZip->PutNextEntry(wxT("content.xml"));
00147 
00148         // save xml document to zipstream
00149         xml.Save(*m_outZip);
00150 
00151         // close entry
00152         m_outZip->CloseEntry();
00153 }
00154 
00155 void OaxExport::createOaxStream()
00156 {
00157         // check if stream has to be written to file, if yes, create outputstream
00158         if (m_saveToFileSystem)
00159         {
00160                 // create FileOutputStream
00161                 //m_outStream = new wxFFileOutputStream(wxT("data\\") + m_assemblyData->m_name + wxT(".oax"));
00162                 m_outStream = new wxFFileOutputStream(m_assemblyData->m_name + wxT(".oax"));
00163 
00164                 // create new wxZipOutputStream object
00165                 m_outZip = new wxZipOutputStream(m_outStream, -1);
00166         }
00167         // if not, use m_outStream
00168         else
00169         {
00170                 m_outZip = new wxZipOutputStream(*m_outStream, -1);
00171         }
00172 
00173         // create new xml entry
00174         createXmlEntry();
00175 
00176         // copy all needed files by this assembly
00177         for (std::list<wxString>::const_iterator it = m_assemblyData->m_listFiles.begin(); it != m_assemblyData->m_listFiles.end(); it++)
00178         {
00179                 // create new inputstream
00180                 wxFFileInputStream inFile((*it));
00181 
00182                 // put nex entry
00183                 wxString filename = (*it).AfterLast('\\');
00184 
00185                 m_outZip->PutNextEntry(filename);
00186 
00187                 // copy data
00188                 inFile.Read(*m_outZip);
00189 
00190                 // close entry
00191                 m_outZip->CloseEntry();
00192         }
00193 
00194         // close zip file
00195         m_outZip->Close();
00196 }
